briefdescription.para: Linked map.
Width of a segment (in mm)
Scalebar style.
Constructor for QgsLayoutItemScaleBar, with the specified parent layout.
Returns the scalebar alignment.
Applies the default scalebar settings to the scale bar.
Applies the default size to the scale bar (scale bar 1/5 of map item width)
Returns the spacing (margin) between the scalebar box and content in millimeters.
Returns the primary brush for the scalebar.

simplesect.para: QBrush used for filling the scalebar

briefdescription.para: Returns the secondary brush for the scalebar.

detaileddescription.para:
This is used for alternating color style scalebars, such as single and double box styles.
QBrush used for secondary color areas
brush

briefdescription.para: Returns the color used for fills in the scalebar.
Returns the secondary color used for fills in the scalebar.
Called after all pending items have been restored from XML.

detaileddescription.para:
Items can use this method to run steps which must take place after all items have been restored to the layout, such as connecting to signals emitted by other items, which may not have existed in the layout at the time readXml() was called. E.g. a scalebar can use this to connect to its linked map item after restoration from XML.
readXml()

briefdescription.para: Returns the font used for drawing text in the scalebar.
Returns the color used for drawing text in the scalebar.
Attempts to guess the most reasonable unit choice for the scalebar, given the current linked map's scale.

detaileddescription.para: This method also considers the linked map's CRS, in order to determine if metric or imperial units are more appropriate.

briefdescription.para: Returns the scalebar height (in millimeters).
Returns the item's icon.
Returns the spacing (in millimeters) between labels and the scalebar.
Returns the cap style used for drawing lines in the scalebar.
Returns the color used for lines in the scalebar.
Returns the join style used for drawing lines in the scalebar.
Returns the line width in millimeters for lines in the scalebar.
Returns the map item linked to the scalebar.
Returns the number of map units per scale bar unit used by the scalebar.
Returns the maximum width (in millimeters) for scale bar segments.

detaileddescription.para:
This property is only effective if the segmentSizeMode() is set to SegmentSizeFitWidth.
segmentSizeMode()

minimumBarWidth()

briefdescription.para: Returns the minimum allowed size of the item, if applicable, or an empty size if item can be freely resized.

Returns the number of segments included in the left part of the scalebar.
Returns the pen used for drawing outlines in the scalebar.
Refreshes a data defined property for the item by reevaluating the property's value and redrawing the item with this new value.

detaileddescription.para: If property is set to QgsLayoutObject::AllProperties then all data defined properties for the item will be refreshed.

briefdescription.para: Resizes the scale bar to its minimum width, without changing the height.
Returns the size mode for the scale bar segments.

briefdescription.para: Sets the number of segments included in the scalebar.
Sets the number of segments included in the left part of the scalebar.
Sets the size mode for scale bar segments.
Sets the scale bar style by name.

detaileddescription.para: The name parameter gives the (untranslated) style name. Possibilities are: 'Single Box', 'Double Box', 'Line Ticks Middle', 'Line Ticks Down', 'Line Ticks Up', 'Numeric'

briefdescription.para: Sets the text format used for drawing text in the scalebar.
Sets the label for units.
Sets the distance units used by the scalebar.
Sets the number of scalebar units per segment.

Returns the label for units.
Returns the distance units used by the scalebar.
Returns the number of scalebar units per segment.
Adjusts the scale bar box size and updates the item.
Returns a new scale bar item for the specified layout.

detaileddescription.para: The caller takes responsibility for deleting the returned object.

briefdescription.para: Draws the item's contents using the specified item render context.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the context's painter has been scaled so that painter units are pixels. Use the QgsRenderContext methods to convert from millimeters or other units to the painter's units.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QDomElement &element, const QDomDocument &document, const QgsReadWriteContext &context) override
memberdef.name: readPropertiesFromElement

briefdescription.para: Sets item state from a DOM element.

detaileddescription.para:
element
is the DOM element for the item
document
DOM document
context
read write context
Note that item subclasses should not rely on all other items being present in the layout at the time this method is called. Instead, any connections and links to other items must be made in the finalizeRestoreFromXml() method. E.g. when restoring a scalebar, the connection to the linked map's signals should be implemented in finalizeRestoreFromXml(), not readPropertiesFromElement().

briefdescription.para: Stores item state within an XML DOM element.

parameterdescription.para: is the DOM element to store the item's properties in

briefdescription.para: Returns diagonal of composer map in selected units (map units / meters / feet / nautical miles)
Calculates with of a segment in mm and stores it in mSegmentMillimeters.
A layout item subclass for scale bars.
